name: voice-game
description: Voice Conversational Kids Game - Testing Suite

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd voice_service && flake8 app tests --max-line-length=100 --ignore=E203,W503 || true
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: cd voice_service && black app tests && isort app tests
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web-client && npm install
